file_insights.changes_summary: Removed FilterListIcon import and Filter button component from the equipment page header
ui_components_removed: Filter button with secondary variant and FilterListIcon
file_insights.notes: Simplified header layout by removing flex container wrapper around search field and filter button, moving search field to direct positioning

patterns_discovered.description: Removed unused Material-UI icon import (FilterListIcon) when removing associated UI component
Removed flex container wrapper when reducing number of header controls from 2 to 1
Clean surgical removal of feature - no orphaned code, dead imports, or conditional logic left behind

approach_outcome.scope_adherence: Perfectly scoped - removed only the Filter button and related imports without affecting search functionality or other UI elements

recommendations.suggestion: Verify that filter functionality is not referenced elsewhere in the component or application state management before removing the button
Confirm that search field still functions correctly with simplified layout and maintains proper spacing on various screen sizes
If filter functionality is needed in future, consider whether it should be implemented as an inline filter panel rather than a separate button
